text.autoconfig.visiblechat.option.rende: Specify how far above the name the text should be rendered
text.autoconfig.visiblechat.option.chatR: Specify how many seconds the text will be displayed
text.autoconfig.visiblechat.option.maxLi: Specify how long a line should be before wrapping
